title: Banana coffee rum trifle
ingredients: ['200ml strong coffee', '1 tablespoon rum', '150g Amaretti biscuits', '4 large bananas, thinly sliced', 'For the custard', '500ml milk', '30g cornflour', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '3 egg yolks', '1 knob butter', 'Topping and decorations', '100g dark chocolate', '350ml double cream', '4 tablespoon toasted flake almonds']
